name: The Kamikaze (Prince El Fresh)
description:
(English version)

The Kamikaze - Synopsis
You are the Star of the smallest City-State in the world after the Vatican. You are preparing for the 1996 Atlanta olympic games.  The night you want to ask your long time girlfriend to marry you, she wants to leave the country for good. The same night, the most wanted criminal is robbing the bank where your girlfriend's dad is working. This night will forever change your lives and the city, exposing hidden secrets.

Will you enjoy the game?
I have always enjoyed romance, thriller, super-hero, action movies (from asia, india and hollywood), revenge movies like "The Crow" or "Man on Fire", dance choreographies and Agatha Christie's novels. Now I get to write my own visual novel in a genre like "Sin City" or "Watchmen", fused with drama and romance. I aim to deliver memorable experiences with my creations and to get you fully immersed in the game.

This game values story telling and drama with some branching choices. 
You will play different characters throughout the game to understand their motivations and maybe act in favour or not, on your main character.

There will be some action content in the game, but it's not the main focus. The general tone will be happy, but if you are in a dark period of your life, I would advise you to be careful.

How often do you plan to release episodes?
As soon as I can release an update, I will release it.
I promise to keep patrons updated on the progress, but I cannot give accurate estimates until an update is ready for release. Something to bear in mind is that I'm doing this all by myself. There's no team of developers, it's just me.

(French version)

Le Kamikaze - Synopsis

Vous êtes la star du pays, la plus petite Cité-Etat après le Vatican. 

Vous allez participer aux Jeux Olympiques d'été à Atlanta le 19 juillet 1996.

Mais lorsque vous perdez goût à la vie, vous vous alliez à un savant fou et un dangereux psychopathe pour vous venger et dévoiler les pires secrets de cette Cité-Etat, construite par des immigrés venus des quatre coins du monde. 

Une femme en quête de repentance peut vous arrêter. 

Y parviendra-telle ? 

L’avenir du pays est entre ses mains... et des vôtres.
